Room.Name: Marina/Eidenhoft Alley
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a winding alley south of the Adrilite Museum of Natural History.
Room.LongDescription: Along the north wall of the alley is a very large building which is the Adrilite Museum of Natural History. This must be the delivery entrance, as there are two really tall doors and a guard station. Several shops and guilds line the south side of the alley. One shop, which is closed, used to be an alchemy shop. A very old and faded sign over a door says, "School of-" But the sign is broken and you cannot read the rest of it.
